resources.string_add: The feature is not available right now. Please, try again later.
Select how field's data will be processed before saving in the database
Note, that improper use of HTML may break the email message's layout. Also make sure that {unsubscribe} marker presents in at least one of the templates (header and/or footer).
Cannot save changes, because {unsubscribe} marker was removed from both templates, header and footer.
